SEARCH
Module overrungl.opengl
Package overrungl.opengl

Class GL10

java.lang.Object
overrungl.opengl.GL10C
overrungl.opengl.GL10
public final class GL10 extends GL10C
GL10 relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • GL10 refers to one or more preview APIs: MemorySegment, SegmentAllocator.
Programs can only use GL10 when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
The OpenGL 1.0 functions.
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
squid233
